com.microsoft.cognitiveservices.speechrecognition

Class MicrophoneRecognitionClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.bing.speech.Conversation
      • com.microsoft.cognitiveservices.speechrecognition.MicrophoneRecognitionClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MicrophoneRecognitionClientWithIntent

    public class MicrophoneRecognitionClient
extends Conversation
    AzureIntelligentServices speech recognition from the microphone. The microphone is turned on and data from the microphone is is sent to the Speech Recognition Service. A built in Silence Detector is applied to the microphone data before it is sent to the recognition service. Returns only text recognition results.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endMicAndRecognition()
      The microphone is turned off and the connection to the Speech Recognition Server is severed.
      void startMicAndRecognition()
      The microphone is turned on and data from the microphone is sent to the Speech Recognition Service.

      • Methods inherited from class com.microsoft.bing.speech.Conversation

        audioStart, audioStop, finalize, PlayWaveFile, StreamTTS, TTSStop

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • startMicAndRecognition

        public void startMicAndRecognition()
        The microphone is turned on and data from the microphone is sent to the Speech Recognition Service. A built in Silence Detector is applied to the microphone data before it is sent to the recognition service.

      • endMicAndRecognition

        The microphone is turned off and the connection to the Speech Recognition Server is severed.
